action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are two red shapes, two purple shapes, one orange shape, and two yellow shapes. The shapes are scattered around the image without touching each other.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (blue, green, gray, cyan) arranged on a white background. The shapes are scattered and do not form a complete pattern.
